data.actual_result: You are unable to revert your save back to what is was until you exit the permission and open it again.
data.expected_result: You are able to save the permission as what it was before you saved.
data.short_description: Changing a role permission on a channel causes it to blink back to what it used to be and go back.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel where you can add/edit roles. - Add a new role. - Give it a checkmark or an X with a permission of your choosing. - Save the changes. - If you gave the role a checkmark, give it an X or vice versa. - You should see it blink back to what it was and go back to your new choice. - If not, do the prior step again [It seems to only happen 50% of the time]. - Now try and select the perm it was before you saved.
